CustomField.formula: IF(MONTH(Snapshopt_Created_Date2__c) <= 3, DATE(YEAR(Snapshopt_Created_Date2__c ), 03 , 31 ), IF(MONTH(Snapshopt_Created_Date2__c ) <= 6, DATE(YEAR(Snapshopt_Created_Date2__c ), 06 , 30 ), IF(MONTH(Snapshopt_Created_Date2__c ) <= 9, DATE(YEAR(Snapshopt_Created_Date2__c ), 09 , 30 ), DATE(YEAR(Snapshopt_Created_Date2__c ), 12 , 31 )))) - Snapshopt_Created_Date2__c
CustomField.label: Days left in this Quarter
